description: Agency may not charge a fee for the first two person-hours spent searching for or copying public records in a calendar month
notes: Unique provision protecting requesters from initial search costs

description: Agency must find that need for confidentiality outweighs public interest in disclosure, considering 8 specific factors
notes: Structured analysis required for withholding decisions

description: Most agencies must provide administrative appeal process before court action
notes: Requires exhausting administrative remedies in many cases
